value.title: The Truth About AI In Healthcare
value.excerpt: In heavily regulated industries such as healthcare, digital innovation can be slow to progress, but when adopted correctly, can have tremendous value. What's the truth about AI adoption in healthcare and where are healthcare companies on their data and AI journey?

value.title: Health-related artificial intelligence needs rigorous evaluation and guardrails
